quote: Make it as simple as possible, but not simpler.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: Don't wish it was easier, wish you were better.
author: Jim Rohn

quote: Don't wish for less problems, wish for more skills.
author: Jim Rohn

quote: Don't wish for less challenge, wish for more wisdom.
author: Jim Rohn

quote: We are what we repeatedly do. Excellence, then, is not an act, but a habit.
author: Aristotle

quote: Mistakes aren't a necessary evil. They aren't evil at all. They are an inevitable consequence of doing something new.
author: Ed Catmull

quote: If you can imagine it, you can achieve it. If you can dream it, you can become it.
author: William Arthur Ward
